title: New: Burial & Four Tet – Nova
body:
So hot off the press I can barely grasp it, Nova is the gorgeous new collab track from **Four Tet** and **Burial**, showcasing just why they are two of the finest producers in the game right now.

It’s atmospheric, vibrant, elegant and completely immersing, fusing the electro vibe of **Four Tet** with the out-and-out dubstep imagination shown by **Burial**. Lose yourself in _Nova_ below.
